description: The scoring record has been shattered. For the first time in US history a wrestler has been made to squirt on the mat as an orgasm was finger fucked out of her during wrestling. title: Syd Blakovich "The Nightmare" (8-2) vs Faye Runaway "The Angel" (0-0)
